Identification.LongTitle: National Security Review of Investments Regulations

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry and the Minister of Canadian Heritage, pursuant to subsections 35(1) and (1.1)a of the Investment Canada Actb, hereby makes the annexed National Security Review of Investments Regulations.

Section.Text: In these Regulations, Act means the Investment Canada Act.
For the purposes of subsection 25.2(1) of the Act, the prescribed period is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an investment referred to in section 11 of the Act, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the certified date referred to in subsection 13(1) of the Act;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an investment referred to in section 14 of the Act, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the certified date referred to in subsection 18(1) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of any other investment, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the day on which it is implemented.

Section.Text: For the purposes of paragraph 25.2(4)(a) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which the period referred to in section 4 expires and ending five days after that day.
For the purposes of subsection 25.3(1) of the Act, the prescribed period is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: if the Minister sends a notice referred to in subsection 25.2(1) of the Act to the non-Canadian, the period beginning on the day on which the notice is sent and ending 45 days after that day; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: if the Minister does not send a notice referred to in subsection 25.2(1) of the Act to the non-Canadian

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: in respect of an investment referred to in section 11 of the Act, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the certified date referred to in subsection 13(1) of the Act,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: in respect of an investment referred to in section 14 of the Act, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the certified date referred to in subsection 18(1) of the Act, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: in respect of any other investment, the period beginning on the day on which the investment first comes to the Minister’s attention and ending 45 days after the day on which it is implemented.

Section.Text: For the purposes of subsection 25.3(6) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which the order for review under subsection 25.3(1) of the Act is made by the Governor in Council and ending 45 days after that day.
For the purposes of subsection 25.3(7) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which the notice is sent to the non-Canadian and ending 45 days after that day.

For the purposes of subsection 25.4(1) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which the investment is referred to the Governor in Council by the Minister and ending 20 days after that day.

Heading.TitleText: Prescribed Investigative Bodies and Classes of Investigative Bodies

Section.Text: For the purposes of subsection 36(3.1) of the Act, the following are prescribed investigative bodies or classes of investigative bodies:

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: Department of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness;

Paragraph.Label: (i)
Paragraph.Text: Department of Foreign Affairs and International Trade;

Paragraph.Label: (o)
Paragraph.Text: Department of Public Works and Government Services;

Paragraph.Label: (t)
Paragraph.Text: all provincial, regional and municipal police forces.

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of subsection 25.2(1) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which these Regulations come into force and ending 60 days after that day if

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the certified date respecting an investment referred to in paragraph 2(a) falls within the period beginning on March 12, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the certified date respecting an investment referred to in paragraph 2(b) falls within the period beginning on February 6, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the day on which an investment referred to in paragraph 2(c) is implemented falls within the period beginning on March 12, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force.

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of subsection 25.3(1) of the Act, if the Minister does not send a notice under subsection 25.2(1) of the Act, the prescribed period is the period beginning on the day on which these Regulations come into force and ending 60 days after that day if

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the certified date respecting an investment referred to in subparagraph 4(b)(i) falls within the period beginning on March 12, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: the certified date respecting an investment referred to in subparagraph 4(b)(ii) falls within the period beginning on February 6, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: the day on which an investment referred to in subparagraph 4(b)(iii) is implemented falls within the period beginning on March 12, 2009 and ending on the day on which these Regulations come into force.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which they are registered.
